mapper.insert: insert into bdc_biz_type_field_mapping (biz_type, field, key, value) values (#{bizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into bdc_biz_type_field_mapping
biz_type,
field,
key,
value,
#{bizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{field,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select * from bdc_biz_type_field_mapping where biz_type=#{bizType} and field=#{fieldName}
